content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #92331 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?

I'm torn between P-low and P-medium. On the one hand, this sort of formatting regression should normally be P-low. On the other hand, as dtolnay says, with this regression, "The person calling the macro needs to reverse engineer where to add/delete spaces in order to get a readable result."
Issue #92331 has been closed while requested for prioritization.
